Class ApplicantCLI

Object
ApplicantCLI
public class ApplicantCLI extends Object
CLI class for Applicants to interact with BTO project application features. Handles project applications, enquiry management, password changes, and displays a personalized dashboard with application/enquiry summaries.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantCLI

      public ApplicantCLI(Applicant applicant, EnquiryController enquiryController, AuthController authController, ApplicationCLI applicationCLI)
      Constructs the CLI interface for the applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.
      enquiryController - Controller handling enquiry-related operations.
      authController - Controller for user authentication and password changes.
      applicationCLI - CLI for managing BTO applications.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the applicant menu loop. Displays dashboard and allows the applicant to navigate available features.

    • showMenu

      private void showMenu()
      Displays the applicant dashboard including application and enquiry status, and open/upcoming project counts.

    • manageEnquiries

      private void manageEnquiries()
      Launches the enquiry management submenu. Allows applicants to submit, view, edit, or delete enquiries.

    • showDashboard

      private void showDashboard()
      Displays a summary dashboard for the applicant.

      Shows:

      • Number of pending applications
      • Number of replied enquiries
      • Total number of open and upcoming projects
